content.question: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.(a) Define rule of law.(b) Describe the difference between rule of law and rule by law.(c) Explain how a state might strengthen rule of law.(d) Explain how the absence of rule of law affects citizen political participation.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.(a) Define rule of law.(b) Describe the difference between rule of law and rule by law.(c) Explain how a state might strengthen rule of law.(d) Explain how the absence of rule of law affects citizen political participation.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
